section.title: Labor Variance by Item
section.para: To view labor variances by Item, select the "Labor Variance by Item" option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing labor variances by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose labor variances by Item you want to view. The browse button located to the right of the field leads to a searchable list of make and buy items.
Select to display labor variances by Item for all Sites.
Specify Site whose labor variances by Item you want to display.
Labor variances by Item generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Labor variances by Item generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists labor variances by Item, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
